product_name: A Climber's Guide to Pinnacles National Monument
long_description: More than 800 routes are detailed in this climbing guide to Pinnacles National Monument. Author: Brad Young. Softcover; 395 pages; black-and-white photographs and illustrations. Brad Young and Steve Dawson; copyright 2007. All the information you need to climb over 800 rock routes, including complete maps, route descriptions, action photos and area information.
short_description: More than 800 routes are detailed in this climbing guide to Pinnacles National Monument.
